name: Buttons?
description:
You love your buttons, to the point of not letting Anyone touch them.

The Blue Button destroys one random enemy with a fast recharging speed

The Red Button creates a barrier around the two, keeping others out

Red clickers are slower, but damage your Blue Button more

Blue clickers are faster, but are also easier to click on

Made for the "Two" United Game Jam

How it relates to the theme : Two buttons/Abilities/Enemies

SFXR used for sound effects

http://www.drpetter.se/project_sfxr.html

Music used

Good And Evil Is Evil by septahelix (c) copyright 2020 Licensed under a Creative Commons Noncommercial Sampling Plus license. http://dig.ccmixter.org/files/septahelix/61280
